meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Seal in</kanji> the <kanji>cylinder</kanji>. This cylinder that is sealed in is an <vocabulary>envelope</vocabulary>. You just have to think back to the day, when things were more like in scroll form. So, a scroll's envelope would have been shaped like a cylinder, making this an <vocabulary>envelope</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
